content: ** see the perles du nord hat pattern here 1 ** ** see the perles du nord jacket pattern here 2 ** english version here 3 jumper sizes s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl materials drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 350-400-400-450-500-550 g color 15 green 50-100-100-100-100-100 g color 01 off white 50-50-50-50-50-50 g color 16 pistachio the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group a see the link below drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 + 80 cm / 16 + 32 size 3 mm/us 2 5 or the size needed to get 24 stitches and 32 row stockinette stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 + 80 cm / 16 + 32 size 2 5 mm/ us 1 5 for rib or the size needed to get 26 stitches and 34 row stockinette stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height ------------------------------------------------------- colour combinations shown are a drops flora 01 14 10 b drops flora 01 07 08 c drops flora 03 04 05 ------------------------------------------------------- 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/180-2-b-perles-du-nord-hat 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/180-4-perle-du-nord-jacket 3 https //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=8046&cid=19
